name: Crossed Art Adventure
description:
Crossing Art Adventure is a platformer about guy named Teo and his sister Pennie, who are trying to sort their works that got mixed up. Also, there is a lot of small details, like Teo's ability draw ideal shapes using a stencil (just like one person with popular drawing of soupcan) and Pennie's levels, made with parody on pop-art style (guess, what person drew a lot of art in pop-art style?).

Walk with WASD, Jump with Space, use Left mouse button to Draw things to walk on, Right to Erase them, Click Middle button to Change their form and Scroll to Rotate/Change color. Watch your Counter/Bar!

Cheat codes

E+R - Delete your all drawings at once

Q+E - Activate Sandbox mode (Infinite drawings)

!Issue with music stopping!

This bug can happen if you play web version of this game, because of game fails to load audio in real time. This should not happen, if you leave game unfocused for a while (after one successful loading, game files will be stored on computer and this problem won't happen again), but you can also try downloading Windows version unstead.
